content: The major components of the sequential margin movement was follows: 1.6%  impact due to lower calendar working days, client contractual provision as explained above and other pricing percentage; 0.6% impact due to lower utilization as we create capacity for the future; 1% due to higher visa costs, third-party costs and other one-offs, which we benefited in Q3, and these were offset by approximately 1.1% benefit due to salary-related benefits, including lower working days, lead costs and others.
